member.name: T:Ceiba.Core.Entities.BaseEntity
member.summary: Base entity class with common audit fields. All entities should inherit from this class to ensure consistent audit tracking.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.BaseEntity.CreatedAt
member.summary: UTC timestamp when the entity was created. Automatically set by the database interceptor.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Core.Entities.BaseEntityWithUser
member.summary: Base entity class for entities with a user creator. Extends BaseEntity with user tracking.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.BaseEntityWithUser.UsuarioId
member.summary: User who created or last modified this entity. References Usuario.Id (ASP.NET Identity user).

member.name: T:Ceiba.Core.Entities.BaseCatalogEntity
member.summary: Base entity class for catalog entities that can be activated/deactivated. Extends BaseEntityWithUser with active status flag.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.BaseCatalogEntity.Activo
member.summary: Indicates if this catalog entry is active. Inactive entries are hidden from user selection but retained for historical data.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Core.Entities.CatalogoSugerencia
member.summary: Configurable suggestion catalog for text field autocomplete. Allows ADMIN users to configure suggestion lists for specific fields. Fields: sexo, delito, tipo_de_atencion

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.CatalogoSugerencia.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the suggestion.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.CatalogoSugerencia.Campo
member.summary: Target field name for this suggestion. Valid values: "sexo", "delito", "tipo_de_atencion" Required, max 50 characters.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.CatalogoSugerencia.Valor
member.summary: Suggestion value to display in autocomplete. Example: "Masculino", "Robo", "Orientación" Required, max 200 characters.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.CatalogoSugerencia.Orden
member.summary: Display order for suggestions (ascending). Lower numbers appear first in dropdown. Default: 0

member.name: T:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Cuadrante
member.summary: Geographic quadrant entity (lowest level in geographic hierarchy). Belongs to a Sector, which belongs to a Zona. Example: "Cuadrante 1-A", "Cuadrante Norte-1" Part of hierarchical catalog: Zona → Sector → Cuadrante

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Cuadrante.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the cuadrante.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Cuadrante.Nombre
member.summary: Display name of the cuadrante. Required, max 100 characters.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Cuadrante.SectorId
member.summary: Foreign key to the parent Sector. Required - cuadrante must belong to a sector.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Cuadrante.Sector
member.summary: Navigation property: Parent sector.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Cuadrante.Reportes
member.summary: Navigation property: Reports assigned to this cuadrante.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Core.Entities.RegistroAuditoria
member.summary: Audit log entry for all system operations. Immutable record of who did what, when. Retention: Indefinite (never deleted per FR-035b).

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.RegistroAuditoria.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the audit log entry. Uses BIGINT to support high volume logging.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.RegistroAuditoria.Codigo
member.summary: Action code identifying the operation performed. See AuditActionCode class for standard codes. Required, max 50 characters. Example: "AUTH_LOGIN", "REPORT_CREATE", "USER_SUSPEND"

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.RegistroAuditoria.IdRelacionado
member.summary: ID of the related entity (if applicable). Example: Report ID for REPORT_CREATE, User ID for USER_SUSPEND Nullable - system-level operations may not have a related entity.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.RegistroAuditoria.TablaRelacionada
member.summary: Table name of the related entity. Example: "REPORTE_INCIDENCIA", "USUARIO", "ZONA" Nullable - system-level operations may not have a related table. Max 50 characters.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.RegistroAuditoria.UsuarioId
member.summary: User who performed the action. References Usuario.Id (ASP.NET Identity user). Nullable - system-triggered operations have NULL user.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.RegistroAuditoria.Ip
member.summary: Client IP address from which the action originated. Supports both IPv4 and IPv6 (max 45 characters). Nullable - may not be available for background jobs.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.RegistroAuditoria.Detalles
member.summary: Additional details in JSON format. Stores context-specific information about the operation. Example: {"old_value": "Borrador", "new_value": "Entregado"} Nullable - simple operations may not need extra details.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Core.Entities.ReporteIncidencia
member.summary: Incident report entity (Type A). Core entity for police incident reporting system. Full implementation in Phase 3 (User Story 1). This is a placeholder to support Phase 2 foundational relationships.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.ReporteIncidencia.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the report.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.ReporteIncidencia.TipoReporte
member.summary: Report type identifier. Default: "A" (Type A report) Extensible for future types (B, C, etc.)

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.ReporteIncidencia.Estado
member.summary: Report state. 0 = Borrador (Draft) 1 = Entregado (Submitted)

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.ReporteIncidencia.ZonaId
member.summary: Foreign key to Zona. Required - every report must have a geographic zone.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.ReporteIncidencia.Zona
member.summary: Navigation property: Zone where incident occurred.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.ReporteIncidencia.SectorId
member.summary: Foreign key to Sector. Required - every report must have a geographic sector.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.ReporteIncidencia.Sector
member.summary: Navigation property: Sector where incident occurred.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.ReporteIncidencia.CuadranteId
member.summary: Foreign key to Cuadrante. Required - every report must have a geographic quadrant.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.ReporteIncidencia.Cuadrante
member.summary: Navigation property: Quadrant where incident occurred.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Sector
member.summary: Geographic sector entity (middle level in geographic hierarchy). Belongs to a Zona, contains multiple Cuadrantes. Example: "Sector 1", "Sector A" Part of hierarchical catalog: Zona → Sector → Cuadrante

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Sector.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the sector.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Sector.Nombre
member.summary: Display name of the sector. Required, max 100 characters.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Sector.ZonaId
member.summary: Foreign key to the parent Zona. Required - sector must belong to a zone.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Sector.Zona
member.summary: Navigation property: Parent zone.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Sector.Cuadrantes
member.summary: Navigation property: Cuadrantes within this sector. Cascade delete configured in EF Core configuration.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Sector.Reportes
member.summary: Navigation property: Reports assigned to this sector.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Zona
member.summary: Geographic zone entity (highest level in geographic hierarchy). Example: "Zona Norte", "Zona Sur", "Zona Centro" Part of hierarchical catalog: Zona → Sector → Cuadrante

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Zona.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the zone.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Zona.Nombre
member.summary: Display name of the zone. Required, max 100 characters.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Zona.Sectores
member.summary: Navigation property: Sectors within this zone. Cascade delete configured in EF Core configuration.

member.name: P:Ceiba.Core.Entities.Zona.Reportes
member.summary: Navigation property: Reports assigned to this zone.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Core.Enums.AuditActionCode
member.summary: Standard audit action codes for system operations. All critical operations must be logged with one of these codes. Follows convention: ENTITY_ACTION pattern.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Core.Interfaces.IAuditService
member.summary: Service interface for manual audit logging. Used for operations that need explicit audit trails beyond automatic interceptor logging.

member.name: M:Ceiba.Core.Interfaces.IAuditService.LogAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Logs an audit event with full details.

member.name: M:Ceiba.Core.Interfaces.IAuditService.QueryAsync(System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Queries audit logs with filtering.

member.name: T:Ceiba.Core.Interfaces.AuditLogDto
member.summary: DTO for audit log query results.

member.name: M:Ceiba.Core.Interfaces.AuditLogDto.#ctor(System.Int64,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.DateTime,System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: DTO for audit log query results.
